t: Amazon.com: Harney & Sons Tea: Earl Grey Tea
s: Earl Grey Tea is perhaps the most famous tea in the world, originally inspired by the British Prime Minister, Earl Grey. There are as many different versions of Earl Grey as there are tea companies. Our popular blend uses teas from India and China, blended with natural oil of bergamot.
